review: Dr. Aatish is an energetic, enthusiastic and consultative doctor with a warm heart. He is quick to understand the patient's situation and provides solutions and alternatives accordingly. He is always calm and patient, and paces the treatment as per patient's ability to handle the treatment. I had undergone 4 RCTs in one sitting, and never felt any discomfort in the process. The dental crowns done by him are one of most comfortable ones. It has been done so Impeccably that it feels almost natural. His clinic is equiped with all the latest equipments. Dr Aatish himself blessed with a heartwarming smile. While dentistry requires deep understanding of science, Dr. Aatish seems to have mastered the art too...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very happy with my consultation and treatment session with Doctor aatish. The clinic is clean and hygienic. Doctor Aatish imparts self care information to all his clients for oral hygiene during any of the consultations , which one can easily involve in a daily routine.

Dr Aatish is * ************** ******* *** caring doctor. He's breadth of knowledge and guidelines helped me pre-, during, and post- treatment. I feel very safe to have given him to do my braces treatment.

My first visit...easy to locate clinic,which is ultra clean,bright and has a wonderful young vibe.Very friendly and efficient staff.
And what do I say about the Doctor?First of all,very empathetic but professional.
Sorted out my dental problem within two visits!I have never had a dental problem since.
I would highly recommend Dr.Aatish Shah to all in need of dental care.
Found Dr. Aatish to be very professional and well informed. felt great comfort talking to him. Highly recommend him

Painless, smooth and clean treatment, environment

an extremely well mannered doctor having enough time for his patients.
excellent. Great explanation of the entire procedure. Great work. Minimum pain. Good follow up.
